name: Dual Poles
description:
This is made for the United Game Jam 2020.

Play as a magnet man and traverse a metallic facility using his unique power to attract and repel both objects and himself.

Game Jam Information:

This fits the theme as magnets have two poles, and you can switch between these polarities as the main mechanic of the game.

All assets are my own, some of the artwork (the player and the crates) were made prior to the jam.

Made with Unity.
